## Description and Rationale

I am a Smart Systems Engineering student passionate about data, innovation, and aviation.
I joined the PRC Data Challenge to learn and explore how open data can be used to improve aviation performance and sustainability.
I want to use smart technologies to find useful solutions for real aviation problems.
